content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting Complex at position(x=-28 to -20, y=-61 to -55)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting mined ore
- 3 Stone furnaces at (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Multiple burner inserters managing ore and plate movement
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting iron and copper plates
- Additional chest at (-22.5,-55.5) collecting iron plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -4, y=-60 to -55)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing ore movement
- Warning: One chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full with iron ore

### Smelting & Assembly Line at position(x=0 to 8, y=-2 to 4)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters managing input/output
- Transport belt system for material movement
- Multiple staging chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3 to 4, y=17 to 27)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network providing power

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction range errors
- Must be within range of the target entity when attempting to extract items
- Position yourself adjacent to chests/miners before attempting extraction

### Full storage errors
- Chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full with iron ore, preventing further mining operations
- Implement better item movement solutions or empty full chests to maintain production flow

### Fuel management errors
- Multiple burner mining drills are non-operational due to lack of fuel
- Ensure all burner devices are supplied with coal before expecting operation

### Power system issues
- Boiler showing "out of fuel" warning
- Steam engine has "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure complete fuel and water supply chain for power generation
